definition: wife of paternal grandfather's younger brother

sentences.english: Barack Obama says his 86-year-old grandmother has died.
sentences.chinese: 巴拉克奥巴马表示他86岁的祖母去世了。

sentences.english: With the radio on, grandma slept deeply in the chair .
sentences.chinese: 无线电收音机开者，祖母在椅子里沉沉的入睡。

sentences.english: Grandmother dotes on her the twins.
Our grandmamas swung on them nooses.
sentences.chinese: 我们的祖母也被绞索绞死。

sentences.english: She often heard from her mother that her grandmother’s home was very different from othes’.Recently she have seen several low-class maids who were dressed and dining surprisingly well.
sentences.chinese: 这林黛玉常听得母亲说过，他外祖母家与别家不同。

sentences.english: But rather than enter rehab, she turned to her family for council, heading with her mother to her 82-year old grandmother's house.
sentences.chinese: 但她并没有进戒毒所，而是向82岁的祖母寻求帮助。

sentences.english: Nick's favorite toy was a fluffy teddy bear his grandmother had given him.
sentences.chinese: 尼克最喜欢的玩具是祖母给他的绒毛玩具熊。

sentences.english: "It is my grandmother's prescription, " Ancelotti said.
sentences.chinese: “这是我祖母的秘方，”安切洛蒂说。

sentences.english: Fedorova is an only child, and she was brought up by her mother and maternal grandparents.
sentences.chinese: 是单亲家庭的女儿，由母亲和外祖父祖母抚养长大。

sentences.english: Would like to see the grandmother glad to dry, but afraid to father confessed.
sentences.chinese: 承乐见了干祖母很高兴，但怕向父亲交代。

sentences.english: It looks like your Grandma took her paintbrush and mixed up some colors.
sentences.chinese: 它看上去像你的祖母用油漆刷混合了一些颜色。

sentences.english: His grandmother's name was Maacah daughter of Abishalom.
sentences.chinese: 他祖母名叫玛迦，是押沙龙的女儿。

sentences.english: In the winter of more than two years ago, grandma died and father lost his job.
sentences.chinese: 那年冬天，祖母死了，父亲的差使也交卸了。

sentences.english: Gary's great-grandma grew aghast at Gary's poor grammar.
sentences.chinese: 加里的曾祖母对加里那糟糕的语法感到很惊讶。

sentences.english: She said it was an antique that her grandmother got from her ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 她说这东西是古董，是她祖母的祖先传下来的。

definition: (informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife
